columns.name: _billingDetails
columns.description: Reference to the BillingDetails of the Waybill

columns.name: _masterWaybill
columns.description: Reference to the master Waybill if it is contained in one

columns.name: _referredBookingOption
columns.description: Refers to the Booking

columns.name: _shipment
columns.description: Reference to the Shipment

columns.name: _checks
columns.description: References to the CheckActions performed on the object

columns.name: _externalReferences
columns.description: References to all associated ExternalReferences

columns.name: _arrivalLocation
columns.description: Reference to the arrival Location

columns.name: _carrierChargeCode
columns.description: One letter charge code as per bullet point 12 - data element 13 from AWB

columns.name: _carrierDeclarationPlace
columns.description: Location of individual or company involved in the movement of a consignment or Coded representation of a specific airport/city code

columns.name: _customsOriginCode
columns.description: Code indicating the origin of goods for Customs purposes (e.g. For goods in free circulation in the EU) List to be provided by local authorities

columns.name: _declaredValueForCarriage
columns.description: The value of a shipment declared for carriage purposes

columns.name: _declaredValueForCustoms
columns.description: The value of a shipment declared for customs purposes

columns.name: _departureLocation
columns.description: Reference to the depature Location

columns.name: _houseWaybills
columns.description: Refers to the Waybill(s) contained

columns.name: _otherChargesIndicator
columns.description: Indicator whether the payment of Other Charges is to be made at origin (prepaid) or at destination (collect) as per bullet point 13 - data element 15a/15b from AWB

columns.name: _serviceCode
columns.description: One letter service code as per bullet point 18.4 - data element 22Z from AWB

columns.name: _waybillType
columns.description: Type of the Waybill: House; Direct or Master

columns.name: _weightValuationIndicator
columns.description: Indicator whether the payment for the Weight/Valuation is to be made at origin (prepaid) or at destination (collect) as per bullet point 13 - data element 14a/14b from AWB

columns.name: _events
columns.description: Events object

columns.name: _skeletonIndicator
columns.description: Indicator whether a logistics object is a skeleton object

columns.name: _destinationCharges
columns.description: Charges levied at destination accruing to the last carrier; in destination currency

columns.name: _involvedParties
columns.description: Information about other Parties involved depending on the context of use

columns.name: _otherCharges
columns.description: Information about Other Charges applying to this Waybill

columns.name: _waybillLineItems
columns.description: Information about rates applying to this Waybill handled as line item

columns.name: _accountingInformation
columns.description: Indicates the details of accounting information. Free text e.g. PAYMENT BY CERTIFIED CHEQUE etc.

columns.name: _carrierDeclarationDate
columns.description: Date upon which the certification is made by the carrier

columns.name: _carrierDeclarationSignature
columns.description: Contains the authentication of the Carrier

columns.name: _consignorDeclarationSignature
columns.description: Name of consignor signatory

columns.name: _destinationCurrencyRate
columns.description: Conversion rate applied

columns.name: _modularCheckNumber
columns.description: The check is a Modular 7 validation on the AWB number; recorded as a boolean.

columns.name: _shippingInfo
columns.description: The shipper or its Agent may enter the appropriate optional shipping

columns.name: _shippingRefNo
columns.description: Optional shipping reference number if any

columns.name: _waybillNumber
columns.description: House or Master Waybill unique identifier

columns.name: _waybillPrefix
columns.description: Prefix used for the Waybill Number. Refer to IATA Airlines Codes
